document.full_text: police said on tuesday they have not determined what caused a miniature train to derail and overturn at a park, killing a six-year-old boy and injuring 19 others.
document.title: inspector fired, investigation continues into flipped train
lines_and_colors: police said on tuesday they have not determined what caused a miniature train to derail and overturn at a park, killing a six-year-old boy and injuring 19 others.
